childhood.en: What is your best childhood memory?
childhood.zh: 你最美好的童年记忆是什么？

childhood.en: Who was your spiritual role model growing up?
childhood.zh: 在成长过程中，谁是你属灵的榜样？

childhood.en: What Bible story captivated you as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候哪个圣经故事最吸引你？

childhood.en: When did you first feel God's presence in your life?
childhood.zh: 你第一次感受到神的同在是什么时候？

childhood.en: What childhood experience taught you about God's love?
childhood.zh: 哪个童年经历让你认识到神的爱？

childhood.en: Who introduced you to faith and how?
childhood.zh: 谁把你带入信仰，是通过什么方式？

childhood.en: What was your favorite church activity as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候你最喜欢的教会活动是什么？

childhood.en: What question about God did you have as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候你对神有什么疑问？

childhood.en: What family tradition helped shape your faith?
childhood.zh: 哪个家庭传统帮助塑造了你的信仰？

childhood.en: When did you first pray on your own?
childhood.zh: 你第一次自己祷告是什么时候？

childhood.en: What hymn or worship song do you remember from childhood?
childhood.zh: 你记得童年时的哪首赞美诗或敬拜歌曲？

childhood.en: Who was the kindest person you knew growing up?
childhood.zh: 在成长过程中，你认识的最善良的人是谁？

childhood.en: What childhood fear did faith help you overcome?
childhood.zh: 信仰帮助你克服了哪个童年的恐惧？

childhood.en: What was your understanding of heaven as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候你对天堂的理解是什么？

childhood.en: What act of kindness from childhood still touches your heart?
childhood.zh: 哪个童年时期的善举至今仍触动你的心？

childhood.en: What did church smell like to you as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候教会给你什么样的气味记忆？

childhood.en: What Bible verse did you memorize first?
childhood.zh: 你第一个背诵的圣经经文是什么？

childhood.en: What made you feel closest to God as a child?
childhood.zh: 小时候什么让你感觉最接近神？

childhood.en: What childhood prayer was answered in an unexpected way?
childhood.zh: 哪个童年的祷告以意想不到的方式得到了回应？

childhood.en: What lesson from Sunday school stuck with you?
childhood.zh: 主日学的哪个教导一直伴随着你？

childhood.en: Who showed you Christ's love through their actions?
childhood.zh: 谁通过他们的行为向你展示了基督的爱？

childhood.en: What childhood moment made you grateful to God?
childhood.zh: 哪个童年时刻让你对神充满感恩？

childhood.en: What did worship look like in your childhood home?
childhood.zh: 在你童年的家中，敬拜是什么样子的？

childhood.en: What childhood experience challenged your understanding of God?
childhood.zh: 哪个童年经历挑战了你对神的理解？

childhood.en: What is the most memorable memory that has shaped who you are?
childhood.zh: 哪个记忆最深刻地塑造了现在的你？

school_work.en: How does your faith influence your work ethic?
school_work.zh: 你的信仰如何影响你的工作态度？

school_work.en: What biblical principle guides your career decisions?
school_work.zh: 什么圣经原则指导你的职业决定？

school_work.en: How do you share your faith in your workplace?
school_work.zh: 你如何在工作场所分享你的信仰？

school_work.en: What professional challenge taught you to depend on God?
school_work.zh: 哪个职业挑战教会你依靠神？

school_work.en: How do you balance ambition with humility?
school_work.zh: 你如何平衡雄心与谦卑？

school_work.en: What does working 'as unto the Lord' mean to you?
school_work.zh: 对你来说，'像为主做工'意味着什么？

school_work.en: How has God opened unexpected doors in your career?
school_work.zh: 神如何在你的职业生涯中打开了意想不到的门？

school_work.en: What workplace situation tested your integrity?
school_work.zh: 哪个工作场合的情况考验了你的正直？

school_work.en: How do you handle workplace conflicts as a Christian?
school_work.zh: 作为基督徒，你如何处理工作中的冲突？

school_work.en: What are you studying or learning about God through right now?
school_work.zh: 你现在正在学习或研究关于神的什么？

school_work.en: How has failure taught you about God's grace?
school_work.zh: 失败如何教会你关于神的恩典？

school_work.en: What skills has God given you to serve others?
school_work.zh: 神赐给你什么技能来服侍他人？

school_work.en: How do you pray about your work decisions?
school_work.zh: 你如何为你的工作决定祷告？

school_work.en: What mentor has impacted your professional and spiritual growth?
school_work.zh: 哪位导师影响了你的职业和属灵成长？

school_work.en: How do you steward the resources God has given you?
school_work.zh: 你如何管理神赐给你的资源？

school_work.en: What does Sabbath rest look like in your busy life?
school_work.zh: 在你忙碌的生活中，安息日的休息是什么样子？

school_work.en: How do you serve God through your profession?
school_work.zh: 你如何通过你的职业服侍神？

school_work.en: What workplace success taught you about God's provision?
school_work.zh: 哪次工作上的成功让你认识到神的供应？

school_work.en: How do you maintain spiritual disciplines during busy seasons?
school_work.zh: 在忙碌的季节你如何保持属灵操练？

school_work.en: What compromise have you refused to make at work?
school_work.zh: 在工作中你拒绝做出什么妥协？

school_work.en: How has God used your education to shape your calling?
school_work.zh: 神如何使用你的教育塑造你的呼召？

school_work.en: What does it mean to work with excellence for God?
school_work.zh: 为神做出卓越的工作意味着什么？

school_work.en: How do you witness to colleagues without words?
school_work.zh: 你如何不用言语向同事作见证？

school_work.en: What professional setback redirected you toward God's plan?
school_work.zh: 哪次职业挫折将你重新引向神的计划？

school_work.en: How do you handle stress and pressure with faith?
school_work.zh: 你如何凭信心处理压力和重担？

belief.en: When did your faith become your own, not just inherited?
belief.zh: 你的信仰何时成为你自己的，而不仅是继承的？

belief.en: What doubt has strengthened your faith?
belief.zh: 什么疑惑反而加强了你的信仰？

belief.en: How would you describe God in one word and why?
belief.zh: 你会用一个词来描述神，是什么？为什么？

belief.en: What Bible verse has changed your life?
belief.zh: 哪节圣经经文改变了你的生命？

belief.en: What miracle have you witnessed or experienced?
belief.zh: 你见证或经历过什么神迹？

belief.en: How do you hear God's voice?
belief.zh: 你如何听到神的声音？

belief.en: What question would you ask God face to face?
belief.zh: 如果能面对面，你会问神什么问题？

belief.en: What aspect of God's character do you find most comforting?
belief.zh: 神的哪个特质让你感到最安慰？

belief.en: How has suffering shaped your faith?
belief.zh: 苦难如何塑造了你的信仰？

belief.en: What do you believe about God that others might not understand?
belief.zh: 你对神有什么信念是别人可能不理解的？

belief.en: What does grace mean to you personally?
belief.zh: 恩典对你个人而言意味着什么？

belief.en: How do you explain your faith to non-believers?
belief.zh: 你如何向非信徒解释你的信仰？

belief.en: What spiritual practice has deepened your relationship with God?
belief.zh: 什么属灵操练加深了你与神的关系？

belief.en: When have you felt most distant from God, and what brought you back?
belief.zh: 你何时感觉离神最远，是什么让你回来？

belief.en: What does it mean to you to be made in God's image?
belief.zh: 按照神的形象被造对你意味着什么？

belief.en: How has your understanding of God evolved over time?
belief.zh: 随着时间推移，你对神的理解如何演变？

belief.en: What do you believe is your spiritual gift?
belief.zh: 你认为你的属灵恩赐是什么？

belief.en: How do you practice forgiveness as God forgives?
belief.zh: 你如何像神饶恕那样实践饶恕？

belief.en: What does the cross mean to you personally?
belief.zh: 十字架对你个人而言意味着什么？

belief.en: How do you experience God's presence in daily life?
belief.zh: 你如何在日常生活中经历神的同在？

belief.en: What worship song or hymn moves you to tears and why?
belief.zh: 哪首敬拜歌曲或赞美诗让你流泪？为什么？

belief.en: How do you reconcile faith with unanswered prayers?
belief.zh: 你如何调和信仰与未得应答的祷告？

belief.en: What does being 'born again' mean in your life?
belief.zh: '重生'在你的生命中意味着什么？

belief.en: How do you pursue holiness in everyday choices?
belief.zh: 你如何在日常选择中追求圣洁？

belief.en: What do you hope to hear God say when you meet Him?
belief.zh: 当你见到神时，你希望听到祂说什么？

relationship.en: When you feel down, how do you want brothers and sisters to help you?
relationship.zh: 当你感到沮丧时，你希望弟兄姐妹如何帮助你？

relationship.en: Who in your church family has impacted you most and how?
relationship.zh: 教会中的谁对你影响最大？怎样影响的？

relationship.en: How do you practice Christ-like love in difficult relationships?
relationship.zh: 在困难的关系中，你如何实践基督般的爱？

relationship.en: What does true Christian friendship mean to you?
relationship.zh: 真正的基督徒友谊对你意味着什么？

relationship.en: How has God used community to heal you?
relationship.zh: 神如何使用团契来医治你？

relationship.en: What makes you feel most loved by others?
relationship.zh: 什么让你感受到被别人爱？

relationship.en: How do you show love in your family?
relationship.zh: 你如何在家庭中表达爱？

relationship.en: What relationship has taught you most about God's love?
relationship.zh: 哪段关系最能教导你神的爱？

relationship.en: How do you handle conflict in Christian relationships?
relationship.zh: 你如何处理基督徒关系中的冲突？

relationship.en: What act of service has deeply touched your heart?
relationship.zh: 哪个服侍的行为深深触动了你的心？

relationship.en: How do you support others who are struggling spiritually?
relationship.zh: 你如何支持在属灵上挣扎的人？

relationship.en: What does biblical hospitality look like to you?
relationship.zh: 圣经中的款待对你来说是什么样子？

relationship.en: How has someone's prayer for you made a difference?
relationship.zh: 别人为你的祷告如何带来了改变？

relationship.en: What boundary have you had to set in relationships for spiritual health?
relationship.zh: 为了属灵健康，你在关系中设定了什么界限？

relationship.en: How do you encourage others in their faith?
relationship.zh: 你如何在信仰上鼓励他人？

relationship.en: What does it mean to 'bear one another's burdens'?
relationship.zh: '彼此担当重担'意味着什么？

relationship.en: How has God brought healing to a broken relationship?
relationship.zh: 神如何医治一段破裂的关系？

relationship.en: What makes you feel safe to be vulnerable with someone?
relationship.zh: 什么让你觉得可以向某人敞开心扉？

relationship.en: How do you show Christ's love to those who hurt you?
relationship.zh: 你如何向伤害你的人展示基督的爱？

relationship.en: What tradition brings your community together?
relationship.zh: 什么传统把你的团契聚在一起？

relationship.en: How do you celebrate others' victories in faith?
relationship.zh: 你如何庆祝他人在信仰上的胜利？

relationship.en: What does 'iron sharpens iron' look like in your life?
relationship.zh: '铁磨铁'在你的生命中是什么样子？

relationship.en: How has someone's faithfulness inspired you?
relationship.zh: 谁的忠心激励了你？

relationship.en: What would you like your church family to know about you?
relationship.zh: 你希望你的教会家人了解你什么？

relationship.en: How do you practice reconciliation as Christ teaches?
relationship.zh: 你如何按照基督的教导实践和解？
